ygData.subject: Re: Factions
ygData.msgSnippet: No.  I am trying to get into Kelethin.  The Wood Elf city.  Getting into the human towns is easy.  I just need to get some people together and slay one of
ygData.messageBody:
No. I am trying to get into Kelethin. The Wood Elf city. Getting into the
human towns is easy. I just need to get some people together and slay one of
those stupid Paladins. I have no use for them anyway. Then, the corrupt
guards will like me, and I'll have no problems. Dwarves are already on
pretty good terms with me, if I go kill some goblins, it'll get beter. But
right now, I want to become friendly with the elves, and the game is
programmed to not let me do that.
